infos.title: Institut d'Implantologie de Québec
infos.description: NCWeather is a minimalistic weather widget for iOS 7 and 8. I developed this app/tweak in collaboration with Thomas Finch, a talented developer. You can see more of his work in the section below.

image.alt: NCWeather's icons on a dark grey background.
